fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: description
fields.value:
- Seasonality represents the regular and predictable fluctuations in the Account Receivable data that occur at specific intervals, such as months or seasons.
- It is calculated by analyzing the recurring patterns in Account Receivable data over these intervals. The seasonality value indicates the strength and direction of these recurring patterns.
- The seasonal graph reveals recurring patterns at regular intervals (seasonal) or longer-term fluctuations (cyclic).
fields.title: Description

fields.name: maxValuesToDisplay
fields.title: Max Values To Display
fields.description: Maximum number of values to display in result.

fields.name: isStreaming
fields.title: Is Streaming?
fields.description: Whether the Graph is a Streaming Graph or not

fields.name: xSortCol
fields.title: Sort on X Column?
fields.description: Whether to Sort on X column or not

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: description
fields.value:
- The trend value represents the overall direction of change in the Account Receivable data over time. It shows whether the Account Receivable are generally increasing, decreasing, or staying relatively constant over a longer period.
- It is calculated by analyzing the pattern and relationship within the Account Receivable data series, often using statistical techniques like linear regression to fit a line to the data points.
- The graph is upward, which means that over time, there is a consistent increase in the values of Account Receivable being observed.
fields.title: Description

fields.name: maxValuesToDisplay
fields.title: Max Values To Display
fields.description: Maximum number of values to display in result.

fields.name: isStreaming
fields.title: Is Streaming?
fields.description: Whether the Graph is a Streaming Graph or not

fields.title: Sort on X Column?
fields.description: Whether to Sort on X column or not
